Package treasure_hunt

Class Position

  • java.lang.Object
    • treasure_hunt.Position
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Position>
    public class Position
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Position>

    Position is the class representing a point on a matrix.

    A position is characterized by :

    • A row index
    • A column index

    Positions are comparable by order of appearance during row browsing

    Author:
    Fran√ßois Poguet, Enzo Costantini
    See Also:
    Positionable, Comparable

        public int getBestDirTo​(Position that,
                        Board mat,
                        boolean careAboutStone,
                        int bypassDir)
        Compute the best direction to have to go to another position
        Parameters:
        that - The position to go
        mat - The cell matrix
        careAboutStone - If true, this method return the best direction without go to a stone cell
        bypassDir - The current bypass direction of hunter
        Returns:
        The best direction
